description:
The five girls in Altair Torte are living together in the team house in Eterno. They talk about the new physics teacher while eating. She has a strange aura about her and Tsubame wonders if she has anything to do with the O`bli. Tsubame and Yuumi then talk about a beautiful detective that is going around solving the school`s mysteries.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arrived! The Beautiful Detective Everyone`s Talking About
登場! ウワサの美少女探偵
